              neglect

speaker: BEROWNE
text:
Of
               
              his
               
              almighty
               
              dreadful
               
              little
               
              might
              .

speaker: BEROWNE
text:
Well
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              love
              ,
               
              write
              ,
               
              sigh
              ,
               
              pray
              ,
               
              sue
              ,
               
              groan
              .

speaker: BEROWNE
text:
Some
               
              men
               
              must
               
              love
               
              my
               
              lady
              ,
               
              and
               
              some
               
              Joan
              .
